data.title: Database Administrator ‚Äì SQL Server (Azure), Remote
data.description:
Location: Remote
Duration: 6 Months Contract

Skills Required:
- Ability to work in a dynamic environment with changing requirements
- Good communication and presentation skills
- Working experience as a SQL Server database administrator in Azure
- Working experience creating and supporting Data Factory data pipelines, DataBricks workspaces, and security groups in Azure.
- Working experience using DevOps CI/CD in Azure.
- Review and rewrite high performance SQL queries using Joins, Cross Apply, Aggregate Queries, Merge, Pivot
- Migrate Stored Procedures, Functions and Views
- Review database designs to identify proper indexing and constraints
- Perform SQL query tuning and performance optimization on complex inefficient queries
- Provide guidance in the use of table variable, temporary table, CTE appropriately to deal with large datasets
- Analyze complex queries for any deadlock resulting due to conflicts
- Collaborate with other DBAs on database design and performance enhancements
- Debug existing code and troubleshoot for issues
- Keep up to date with the latest database features, techniques, and technologies.
- Support current business applications including the implementation of bug fixes as needed
- Able to multi-task and adapt to shifting priorities
- Able to meet deadlines set in project planning
- Effectively communicate progress through the project execution phase
- Follow industry and company standard coding practices
- Produce technical and application documentation
- Test database process for future enhancements and bug fixes
- Assist support analysts and developers with issues they are unable to resolve.
- Ensure customer satisfaction by meeting customer needs in a courteous and timely manner

Roles & Responsibilities:
- Work with a highly dynamic team focused towards Digital Transformation
- Understand the domain and business processes to successfully perform SQL Server database administration tasks (project or maintenance related) in Azure.
- Provide work status and coordinate with other Database administrators and developers.
- Manage customer deliverables and regularly report the status via Weekly/Monthly reviews
data.hugeeAds: üí° This is the perfect place for freelancers to see you!

data.title: Marketing Content Developers
data.description:
Job Summary:
We are seeking a skilled Marketing Content Developers to join our team. As a Developer, you will be responsible for creating high-quality, engaging content that drives results for our business, technical as well as marketing campaigns.

Responsibilities:
- Write and edit business, technical and marketing content across various channels, including social media, email, blog posts, and landing pages
- Develop content that is optimized for search engines and drives conversions
- Collaborate with designers, product marketers, and other stakeholders to ensure content is aligned with company goals
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and developments to ensure content is fresh and relevant
- Conduct research to stay informed about our target audience and their needs
- Use analytics tools to track content performance and make data-driven decisions

Requirements:
- 1+ years of experience in content writing or marketing
- Portfolio that showcases your writing skills and experience
- Strong understanding of Business and marketing principles and practices
- Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills
- Ability to work independently and collaboratively as part of a team
- Familiarity with content management systems and analytics tools
- Bachelor's degree in English, Business, Marketing, or a related field

What We Offer:
- Competitive Compensations and benefits package
- Opportunity to work with a fast-growing company and make a real impact
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Professional development opportunities to help you grow your skills
- Flexible work arrangements as we are a remote company.
data.hugeeAds: üí° This is the perfect place for freelancers to see you!

data.title: Senior Product Designer
data.description:
About the Role:
As a Senior Product Designer/Senior UX/UI Designer, you will take the lead in designing that cutting-edge e-commerce platform from the ground up. You will be responsible for delivering wireframes, developing UX/UI design, and creating prototypes for three key personas: Sellers, Users/Buyers, and Admin Dashboard Users.

Key Responsibilities:
Experience: 4+ years
Wireframing & Prototyping.
Develop comprehensive wireframes and high-fidelity prototypes to communicate design ideas and interactions.
Create user flows, journey maps, and personas to ensure a user-centered design approach.
data.hugeeAds: üí° This is the perfect place for freelancers to see you!

data.title: UX/UI Design
data.description:
Design intuitive and visually appealing interfaces for our e-commerce platform.
Conduct user research, usability testing, and gather feedback to continuously improve the user experience.
Apply industry best practices and emerging trends to design decisions.

Product Development:Collaborate closely with product managers, developers, and stakeholders to translate business goals into effective design solutions. Ensure consistency in design language across all touchpoints of the product.

Stakeholder Management:
Present design concepts and prototypes to stakeholders, gather feedback, and iterate accordingly.>br>Work with cross-functional teams to understand user needs and business requirements.

Experience:
5+ years of professional experience in UX/UI design, preferably within startup environments and e-commerce platforms.
Proven experience in designing for multiple personas (Sellers, Users/Buyers, Admins).

Skills:
Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD, or similar.
Strong understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices.
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Preferred:
Experience with end-to-end product design and development.
Previous experience in designing admin dashboards and e-commerce solutions.

How to Apply: Please send your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter detailing your relevant experience.

data.title: Business Developer
data.description:
Company: Tech Zavvy
Location: Remote
Working Hours: 5-6 hours per day (Flexible)
Experience: 1-2 years in a similar role
Trial Period: 10 days required for final selection.

Job Summary:The primary role of the Business Developer is to drive sales by generating leads of potential clients. This position is ideal for a self-starter with a proven track record in business development and sales. The successful candidate will have the flexibility to work remotely and the opportunity to contribute to the growth and success of Techzavvy.

1-2 years of experience in business development, sales, or a related field
Proven track record of generating leads and achieving sales targets
Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Proficiency in using CRM software and other sales tools
Excellent organizational and time management skills
Ability to adapt to a flexible working schedule

Benefits:
Flexible working hours
Remote work opportunity
Competitive salary and commission structure
Professional development and growth opportunities
Collaborative and supportive team environment

data.title: Salesforce Business Analyst¬†
data.description:
Urgently Hiring For
Salesforce Business Analyst¬†
Experience: 6 - 8 Years
Location: Remote

Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze business requirements related to Salesforce platform.
- Translate business requirements into technical specifications for Salesforce configuration and customization.
- Configure Salesforce to meet business needs, including but not limited to custom objects, fields, workflows, and validation rules.
- Perform data analysis and data migrations as needed to support Salesforce initiatives. - Conduct user training sessions and provide ongoing support to Salesforce users.
- Collaborate with developers and administrators to implement and maintain integrations between Salesforce and other systems.
- Stay current with Salesforce releases and new features to advise stakeholders on best practices and optimizations.
- Participate in the testing and quality assurance processes for Salesforce enhancements and releases.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in business administration, Information Systems, or related field. - 6 to 8 years of experience as a SF
- Business Analyst, with a focus on Salesforce implementations.
- Salesforce Administrator certification is preferred.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively engage with stakeholders at all levels.
- Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus.
